text: Luca, can I have a moment?

Regarding the upcoming live, The concept for the
costumes has been decided, so I want you to confirm.

And, I'm sorry for the sudden request, But I'd like to ask
you to do the poster shoot for the announcement next week.

Even though the details of the live haven't been
finalized yet, the main visual will be released in advance.

It might be difficult to grasp the image for the shoot,
But are you okay with it?
Once again, it's all about your convenience...
